name: bracken
description:
Bracken (Bayesian Reestimation of Abundance with KrakEN) is a highly
accurate statistical method that computes the abundance of species in
DNA sequences from a metagenomics sample.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-exporter-tiny
dependencies.description:
An exporter with the features of Sub::Exporter but only core
dependencies

dependencies.name: perl-list-moreutils
dependencies.description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util

dependencies.name: perl-parallel-forkmanager
dependencies.description: A simple parallel processing fork manager
